name: Radiant Stalker
conimmunities: charmed, exhaustion, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, poisoned

traits.name: Radiant Aura
traits.desc: The stalker sheds bright light in a 15- foot radius and dim light for an additional 15 feet.

traits.name: Charging Strike
traits.desc: If the stalker moves at least 20 feet straight toward a target it begins to glow with divine energy. If the stalker hits that target with its impale attack on this turn, the target takes an additional 9 (2d8) radiant damage and becomes charged with divine energies. The first time that target deals damage to the stalker on its next turn, it takes an additional 9 (2d8) radiant damage as these energies surge.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The stalker makes two attacks with its impale or three with its radiant beam.

actions.name: Impale
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 12 (2d8 + 3) piercing damage plus 4 (1d8) radiant damage.

actions.name: Radiant Beam
actions.desc: Ranged Spell Attack: +6 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (3d6) radiant damage.

actions.name: Resplendent Assault (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: The stalker unleashes twin beams of energy that spiral around the room. Each creature within 60 feet of the stalker make two DC 14 Constitution saving throws, taking 18 (4d8) radiant damage for each failed save.
